TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StoryFragment extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.BlockElement>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class StoryFragment Implements IAddChild, IEnumerable(Of BlockElement)

summary.span: 代表 XPS 文件內完整或部分的劇本。

span.span: Represents all or part of a story within an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XPS 劇本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件是約略相當於在雜誌或報紙劇本。An XPS story in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document is roughly analogous to a story in a newspaper or magazine. 它是一段文字和圖形的內容，通常是在單一主題中，在單一上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。It is a passage of text and graphic content, usually on a single topic, within a single [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 一般而言，跨越多個頁面，但它可以是少於一頁，如同 [資訊看板] — boxed 的劇本 — 雜誌中的。Typically, it spans multiple pages, but it can be shorter than a page like a sidebar — boxed story — in a magazine. 本文也可以是像是第 4 頁繼續的封面報紙劇本不連續。A story can also be discontinuous like a front page newspaper story that is continued on page 4. 因此，指定的頁面中可以有一個以上的劇本和組件的多個劇本。Consequently, a given page can have more than one story and parts of more than one story. 也是劇本的一種特殊，完全包含在單一頁面上的頁首或頁尾。A header or footer is also a special kind of story that is entirely contained on a single page. A代表所有或部分的本文。A represents all or a portion of a story. 它可以絕不會跨越多個頁面上，但可以佔用整個頁面或分享其他片段中的頁面。It can never span more than one page, but it can occupy the whole of a page or share a page with other fragments. 本文是否位於多個頁面上，它在每個頁面上的每個部分是個別的片段。If a story is on more than one page, each part of it on each page is a separate fragment. 雖然劇本可以有不連續的片段的集合，但是沒有片段本身可以是不連續。Although stories can have discontinuous sets of fragments, no fragment can itself be discontinuous. 只有項目可以是父代。Only a element can be a parent of a . 位置內的項目指出如果本文包含在多個片段，而且如果其他片段之前，或依照目前的片段。The location of the elements within a indicates if the story is contained in multiple fragments, and if the additional fragments either precede or follow the current fragment. 當中間部分的結構化項目結束; 假設是``，然後[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件產生的應用程式必須插入適當的結束標記的項目 (在此情況下``) 之前``標記，甚至不過結構中的更新版本的片段正在繼續。When a ends in the middle of some structural element; say a ``, then [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document-producing applications must insert an appropriate end tag for the element (in this case ``) before the `` tag, even though the structure is being continued in a later fragment. (這是為了確保內的項目樹狀是有效的 XML。)繼續劇本片段的開頭必須中斷結構開頭的標記。(This is necessary to ensure that the element tree within the is valid XML.) The fragment that continues the story must begin with an opening tag for the interrupted structure. 中斷結構的整個樹狀結構必須是相同的方式處理 （有一個例外狀況，如下所示）： 結束標記必須先新增中斷點上述每個不相符的開始標記。The entire tree of interrupted structures must be treated the same way (with one exception, discussed below): End tags must be added for every unmatched start tag above the point of interruption. 例外狀況適用於當劇本中斷之後，隨即出現``標記，則產生的應用程式必須插入空的資料表資料格結構 (``) 在對應的時間點繼續該劇本的片段中。The exception applies when the story interruption comes immediately after a `` tag, then the producing application must insert an empty table cell structure (``) at the corresponding point in the fragment that continues the story. 這是本文的必要的以便使用需要合併指定的所有片段的應用程式可以使用簡單的演算法，若要這樣做。This is necessary so that consuming applications that need to merge all fragments of a given story can use a simple algorithm to do this. 例如，假設，應用程式想要新增下列內容，以[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件：Assume, for example, that an application wanted to add the following material to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document: ``` ``` 如果分頁符號會強制在片段結束之後``"SomeContent"，如應用程式必須建立分割如下列範例所示：If a page break forces an end to the fragment just after the `` for "SomeContent", the application must create the split as shown in the following example: ``` ``` 讀取文件的應用程式可能需要合併此內容。An application that reads the document might need to merge this content. 例如，考慮使用 XPS 檢視器**複製到剪貼簿的整個本文**按鈕; 或**Blind 的 XPS**劇本給語音合成器的應用程式。Consider, for example, an XPS viewer with a **Copy Whole Story to Clipboard** button; or an **XPS for the Blind** application that passed stories to a voice synthesizer. 讀取文件的某些應用程式可能需要合併的劇本片段的子集。Some applications that read the document may need to merge a subset of the fragments of a story. 例如，即可 triple-它會將整個段落複製到剪貼簿的功能會想要進行合併，只要在一段會跨越分頁，因為這類段落會分割成兩個s。For example, a feature that copies a whole paragraph to the clipboard by triple-clicking it would need to do a merge whenever the paragraph spanned a page break, because such a paragraph would be split between two s. **若要合併使用此演算法：****To merge use this algorithm:** 1. 刪除``從合併和刪除的第一個片段的結尾``從第二個開頭。Delete the `` from the end of the first fragment to be merged and delete the `` from the beginning of the second. 2. 如果最後的結尾標記的第一個片段的第一次的開頭標記為相同類型的第二個片段 (且不是``標記)，這兩者同時刪除。If the last closing tag of the first fragment is of the same type as the first opening tag of the second fragment (and they are not `` tags), delete them both. 3. 重複步驟 2 中，在兩個片段之前*任一*種狀態：Repeat step 2 until the two fragments are in *either* of these states: - 不再是片段的片段的最後一個結束標記開頭結尾的第一個開始標記的型別相符。There is no longer a type match between the last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment. - 最後一個結束標記開頭的片段結尾的片段的第一個開始標記都``標記。The last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment are both `` tags. 在上述範例中，如果產生的應用程式中，未加入的空白儲存格然後合併片段會產生的資料表，其第一個資料列具有包含而不是原始"SomeContent"和"MoreContent"參考第一次只能有一個資料格資料列兩個資料格，每個都包含單一的參考In the example above, if the empty cell had not been added by the producing application, then a merger of the fragments would produce a table whose first row had only one cell containing both the "SomeContent" and "MoreContent" references instead of the original first row with two cells, each containing a single reference 當合併整個本文時，此演算法應該屬於相同的劇本的每個後續片段重複。When the entire story is being merged, the algorithm should be repeated for each subsequent fragment that is part of the same story. 屬於劇本片段會編製索引``項目。The fragments that belong to a story are indexed in the `` element. 請參閱章節 9.1.15[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格其中您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). 必須為給定的劇本的最後一個片段項目做為其最後一個子系。The last fragment for a given story will have a element as its last child. ## Examples 下列範例所示``屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following example shows the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructStoryFragContent1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage1_structure.xaml#docstructstoryfragcontent1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關`FragmentName`屬性``屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件，請參閱第 9 的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格其中您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `FragmentName` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的值包括"Header，""頁尾 」 和 「 內容 」。Possible values include "Header," "Footer," and "Content." 如需有關`FragmentType`屬性``屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件，請參閱第 9 的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格其中您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `FragmentType` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下列範例所示`FragmentType`屬性``屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following example shows the `FragmentType` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定本文的所有片段必須都有相同的值，這個屬性。All fragments of a given story must have the same value for this property. 它必須符合`StoryName`屬性``項目。It must match the `StoryName` attribute of the `` element. 請參閱章節 9.1.15[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格其中您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). 如果這個屬性可以是未指定是頁首或頁尾。This property can be unspecified if is Header or Footer. ## Examples 下列範例所示`StoryName`屬性``屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following example shows the `StoryName` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
